sentences.en: Frequently banality is the better parts of valor.
sentences.cn: 老生常谈往往比大胆打破常规更为人称道.

sentences.en: Hence， the limited perspective of active and energetic people, the banality of their thought and actions.
sentences.cn: 因此，有限的行动前途，精力充沛的人，他们想法以及行动的陈腐。

sentences.en: It all happens with the implacable symmetry and merciless banality of life.
sentences.cn: 一切的发生都伴随着生活那无法改变的匀称和残忍的平庸.

sentences.en: It is a mass-producer of banality.
sentences.cn: 这是陈腐平庸的大规模制造者。

sentences.en: Life in the middle of gleaming appear brightappear reality in the banality.
sentences.cn: 生命在闪耀中现出绚烂,在平凡中现出真实.

sentences.en: the banality of modern city life
sentences.cn: 现代城市生活的单调乏味

sentences.en: White poplar , the creature far from banality merits all my eulogy.
sentences.cn: 白杨树实在是不平凡的, 我赞美白杨树.

words.tran_cn: 陈腐的；平庸的；老一套的
